changeSet.sql:
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW readable.relationship_chain AS SELECT c.id, r1.name AS input1, r2.name AS input2, r3.name AS result, c.notes, res.name AS research, up.name AS updated_by, c.update_date FROM ruleform.relationship_chain c JOIN ruleform.relationship r1 ON c.input1 = r1.id JOIN ruleform.relationship r2 ON c.input2 = r2.id JOIN ruleform.relationship r3 ON c.result = r3.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.research res ON c.research = res.id JOIN ruleform.resource up ON c.updated_by = up.id;
ALTER TABLE readable.relationship_chain OWNER TO core;
